description:
Unity 6 has launched and is being touted as the most stable and high-performing version of the game development platform to date. Matt Bromberg, President and CEO of Unity, revealed the launch in a blog post, emphasising the company’s commitment to developer-centric improvements and long-term support. Bromberg, who recently took the helm from John Riccitiello... Read more »

The post Unity 6 launches amid ongoing effort to rebuild trust appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Unity 6 launches amid ongoing effort to rebuild trust
